title: BANDS x AIML Collab Projects Night – Part 2
excerpt: Join BANDS x QUT AI & ML Society for Collab Projects Night Part 2! Learn to build and showcase your ML portfolio with expert guidance.
description: You’ve started building your ML portfolio, now let’s make it shine! Join us for Part 2 of the collaboration between BANDS and the QUT AI & ML Society as we dive deeper into maintaining and showcasing your Machine Learning journey. Highlights include a keynote by Albert Dai, tips on ML newsletters & staying updated, portfolio building & maintenance, and an interactive Q&A with hands-on challenges. Whether you’re starting fresh or already building your reputation, this event will give you the tools and confidence to maintain a professional ML presence.
